Pricing – Alturascope UK

Transparent, all-inclusive pricing in GBP for sites across the United Kingdom. Typical travel costs (road, rail, local taxis) are included in every visit, so you see one number and know your exposure up front.

Pricing below applies to typical commercial sites up to 10,000 sq ft across mainland UK. Larger or unusually complex facilities, very remote locations, or sites requiring overnight stays may be quoted separately. In rare cases where travel falls outside normal patterns, incremental costs may be passed through at cost and agreed with you in advance.

Single-visit option

Site Reality Pack — Single Visit (Basic)

One-off visit when you need visuals and key facts without committing to a bundle.

From

£500

per visit

  • Weekday, daytime visit for a single site (up to 10,000 sq ft).
  • Core photo set and 360° / digital twin walkthrough.
  • Headline fixture & services counts (lights, diffusers, sprinklers, WCs, key equipment).
  • Concise snapshot report summarising key conditions, upsides, and concerns.
  • Ideal for quick checks and simple decisions — heavier reporting and drone coverage available as add-ons.

"From" pricing assumes typical commercial sites in major markets, up to 10,000 sq ft, with weekday access. Remote or complex sites, night/weekend access, enhanced narrative reporting, drone capture, and stakeholder representation may be quoted at a higher rate and agreed in advance.

Rush delivery is billed at +25% of the applicable visit rate. Night (6pm–6am) or weekend access is billed at +50%.

Included in every visit

  • Pre-visit coordination with your team and building / site management.
  • On-site capture of architectural, MEP, and access conditions.
  • Digital twin or 360° walkthrough for remote stakeholders.
  • Labeled photo set covering shell, core, services, and issues.
  • Fixture & services counts appropriate to the level of service (snapshot for Basic single visits; full counts for bundles).
  • Option to operate fully white-label as part of your team (logo, templates, PPE, and email signature aligned to your brand).

Full narrative reporting, drone coverage, and stakeholder representation are included in monthly bundles and available as add-ons to single visits.

Monthly bundles (United Kingdom)

For landlords, funds, and occupiers running multiple projects a month across the U.K., bundled capacity makes planning simple.

Core 8 (UK)

For steady regional activity across the U.K.

8 visits / month

Request pricing
  • Up to 8 full site visits / month (each up to 10,000 sq ft)
  • Mainland U.K. coverage; typical road/rail/local taxis included
  • Any visit type (As-Built, Progress, Diligence)
  • Priority scheduling within 10 business days

Rush delivery is billed at +25% of the applicable visit rate. Night (6pm–6am) or weekend access is billed at +50%.

Growth 10 (UK)

Ideal for active portfolios across multiple U.K. markets.

Most popular
Request pricing
  • Up to 10 full site visits / month (each up to 10,000 sq ft)
  • Mainland U.K. coverage; typical road/rail/local taxis included
  • Mix and match visit types as needed
  • Priority scheduling within 7 business days

Rush delivery is billed at +25% of the applicable visit rate. Night (6pm–6am) or weekend access is billed at +50%.

Portfolio 12 (UK)

For continuous roll-outs and national U.K. programmes.

12 visits / month

Request pricing
  • Up to 12 full site visits / month (each up to 10,000 sq ft)
  • Mainland U.K. coverage; typical road/rail/local taxis included
  • Designed for multi-site, multi-region portfolios
  • Top-priority scheduling within 5 business days

Rush delivery is billed at +25% of the applicable visit rate. Night (6pm–6am) or weekend access is billed at +50%.

Stakeholder Walkthrough & Trade Day (UK)

On-site representation with your brokers, clients, landlords, and trades to align scope, budgets, and expectations around the real space.

  • Hosted walkthroughs with brokers, client reps, and/or landlords
  • Coordinated trade walk to support accurate pricing and scope clarity
  • Live clarification of structural, services, access, and base-build issues
  • Concise follow-up summary with key agreements, open items, and cost risks

From £1,000 as a half-day add-on when combined with a Site Reality, Progress, or Diligence visit. Standalone representation days can be quoted separately based on location and agenda.

Drone photo & video add-on (UK)

Add focused aerial coverage to any visit (where legal and safe to fly under U.K. rules).

  • High-resolution roof & site stills
  • Context views of parking, access, loading, neighbours
  • Short raw video clips for internal updates & investor decks

Priced per visit based on location, airspace restrictions, and permissions. Included in your quote before we mobilise.

Custom retainers & enterprise (UK)

Running more than 12 sites a month across the U.K., or working across multiple business units?

We can structure a portfolio retainer aligned to your pipeline and reporting cadence, including standardised templates, integration with your PM tools, and custom deliverables for investors and lenders.

Talk to us about your portfolio and we’ll recommend a simple structure that protects your time and budget.

Not sure which UK option fits?

Share your buildings, locations, and timelines. We’ll suggest the right mix of single visits and bundles for the U.K., and send a clear, all-in proposal.
